sentences.sentence: Does this emulated environment have this new statement in its local COBOL?
sentences.translation: 这一模拟环境在其本地COBOL中是否有此新语句？

sentences.sentence: In most cases I simply emulated them, rather then rewriting the code.
sentences.translation: 大多数情况下，我只是简单的模拟它们，而不是重写代码。

sentences.sentence: This is one of the most common issues users face when running emulated applications.
sentences.translation: 当用户运行被模拟的应用程序时，这是要面对的最常见问题之一。
